remarks: Obsolete version of ~ sgrpass as of 3-Feb-2020.  A semi-group is associative.  (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
smgrpassOLD.1 $e |- X = dom dom G $.
smgrpassOLD $p |- ( G e. SemiGrp -> A. x e. X A. y e. X A. z e. X ( ( x G y ) G z ) = ( x G ( y G z ) ) ) $.
$d G x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
